Author: lukechilds#2707
Content: If you view the network tab as your press buy/sell do all the requests stop?

Author: lukechilds#2707
Content: we grey out the button until mm responds to the order request

Author: lukechilds#2707
Content: and it can't do anything else while it's processing that request so it blocks everything

Author: lukechilds#2707
Content: normally it doesn't take too long but occasionally it can take quite a while

Author: lukechilds#2707
Content: and I think you will probably need atleast one peer before placing an order

Author: lukechilds#2707
Content: otherwise I don't think you'll be able to broadcast it to the network

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: yeah after I restarted it just wasnt connecting to peers anymore

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: which is probably why the button was greyed out

Author: lukechilds#2707
Content: very odd

Author: lukechilds#2707
Content: it really sounds like some kind of networking/firewall issue on your end

Author: lukechilds#2707
Content: but the fact that you get the same issue at home and at work

Author: lukechilds#2707
Content: and the fact that the dev build worked ok

Author: lukechilds#2707
Content: doesn't really support that theory

Author: lukechilds#2707
Content: could you maybe try alternating between the dev build and the prebuilt binary a few times

Author: lukechilds#2707
Content: let it run for a few mins, then check the connected peers

Author: lukechilds#2707
Content: if you try on dev build, then on prebuilt and do that about three times on each

Author: lukechilds#2707
Content: if you consistently get peers on the dev build but not on the pre built release at least we can be sure it's something to do with the release build
